divs: Sighting Detailsi was walking with my brother down the road when we both looked up at what first glance was the moon, upon studying it we realized it was not. we started to walk he oppisite direction and the object followed. we walked into the woods hoping to get closer. at one point we decided it was nothing and started walking home once again. as we glanced back we realized it got dimmer and dimmer as we walked away. i felt the need to investigate further and my brother needed no convincing. once we started back toward the object into the woods we noticed that the object resumed gettin brighter. it was a pitch black night and the light casted shadows it was so bright. it is hard to believe but the light gae off a spotlight like beam like it was guiding us through the woods. several times we looked at each other and made sure we were both seeing the same thing and not just imagining things. i felt like a kid on a feild trip, who was being guided by a trusted teacher. after a ways we came upon a clearing. at that point my brother stood transfixed staring at the light.i said his name several times with no responce, i kept it up untill he calmy stated noah everything is fine stop bothering me, or something to that extent. we continued on and ended up at an electricity plant. feet growing cold and the late hour made us turn and go home
